def main():
    k, n = map(int, input().split())
    a_list = list(map(int, input().split()))
    a_list.append(a_list[0] + k)

    min_dist = k
    for i in range(n):
        dist = a_list[i + 1] - a_list[i]
        if dist < min_dist:
            min_dist = dist

    print(min_dist)


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

K, N = map(int, input().split())
A = list(map(int, input().split()))

# 全ての順列を試す
ans = float('inf')
for i in range(N):
    total = 0
    for j in range(1, N):
        total += A[(i + j) % N] - A[(i + j - 1) % N]
    ans = min(ans, total)

print(ans)
